snippet.title: Dream Hard playthrough footage
snippet.description:
This is an AI-assisted playthrough of Dream Hard, a queer brawler defense game made by Robert Yang for a NYC queer performance space called The Dreamhouse; presented in conjunction with Death By Audio Arcade, made in a month in Summer 2018. (The game is a little bit too difficult for the demo AI, so there's a few instances of cheat code usage in this playthrough. Sorry!)

artist statement: https://www.blog.radiator.debacle.us/2018/06/dream-hard-as-queer-brawler-defense.html
music by Renim: https://soundcloud.com/renim_g/
game by Robert Yang: https://debacle.us
